Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Colchester, Holiday Inn Colchester is close to Colchester Zoo and Colchester Golf Club. This hotel is within the vicinity of Tymperleys Clock Museum and Colchester Castle Museum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 109 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and complimentary newspapers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Treat yourself with body treatments and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, including a health club, an indoor pool, and a spa tub. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge) and wedding services.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, a computer station, and express check-out. Planning an event in Colchester? This hotel has 1356 square feet (126 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

Located in Colchester, Holiday Inn Colchester is close to Colchester Zoo and Colchester Golf Club. This hotel is within the vicinity of Tymperleys Clock Museum and Colchester Castle Museum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Colchester Zoo - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Colchester Golf Club - 4.9 km / 3.1 mi
Tymperleys Clock Museum - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi
Colchester Castle Museum - 5.4 km / 3.4 mi
Colchester Natural History Museum - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
Hollytrees Museum - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Colchester Castle Park - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi
East Anglian Railway Museum - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi
Layer Marney Tower - 8.1 km / 5 mi
Abberton Reservoir - 8.3 km / 5.2 mi
University of Essex - 9.2 km / 5.7 mi
Beth Chatto Garden - 12.5 km / 7.8 mi
Sir Alfred Munnings Art Museum - 13.4 km / 8.3 mi
Flatford Mill - 15.4 km / 9.6 mi
Benton Hall Golf and Country Club - 16.9 km / 10.5 mi

The preferred airport for Holiday Inn Colchester is London (STN-Stansted) - 38.5 km / 24 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Holiday Inn Colchester is London (STN-Stansted) - 38.7 km / 24 mi.
